She holds this motionless pose across a long and contemplative silence. Finally she draws out a single pire and balances the coin on her knuckles.}} Okauro is different from other bounty hunter fixers in that she ascribes an almost mystical value to the act of trading heads for coin. However, that also means that she honors every contract - or coin bond - to the letter. Part of it comes from the fact that she's a paladin of the Goldpact order. Part from the fact that her zeal has given her an almost perfect work attendance record. Oh, and she also enjoys knitting.
